name: customn8n_generateAudit
description: Generate a security audit for your n8n instance.

additionalOptions.description: Additional options for generating the audit report.

daysAbandonedWorkflow.description: Days for a workflow to be considered abandoned if not executed.

categories.description: Categories to include in the audit report.

name: customn8n_createCredential
description: Creates a credential that can be used by nodes of the specified type.

data.description: The credential data. Varies based on the credential type.

name: customn8n_deleteCredential
description: Deletes a credential from your instance. You must be the owner of the credentials.

id.description: The credential ID that needs to be deleted.

name: customn8n_getCredentialType
description: Show credential data schema.

credentialTypeName.description: The credential type name that you want to get the schema for.

name: customn8n_getExecutions
description: Retrieve all executions from your instance.

includeData.description: Whether or not to include the execution's detailed data.

status.description: Status to filter the executions by.

workflowId.description: Workflow to filter the executions by.

projectId.description: Project to filter the executions by.

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return.

cursor.description: Paginate by setting the cursor parameter to the nextCursor attribute returned by the previous request's response.

name: customn8n_getExecution
description: Retrieve an execution from your instance.

includeData.description: Whether or not to include the execution's detailed data.

name: customn8n_deleteExecution
description: Deletes an execution from your instance.

name: customn8n_createTag
description: Create a tag in your instance.

name.description: Name of the tag to create.

name: customn8n_getTags
description: Retrieve all tags from your instance.

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return.

cursor.description: Paginate by setting the cursor parameter to the nextCursor attribute returned by the previous request's response.

name: customn8n_getTag
description: Retrieves a tag.

name: customn8n_deleteTag
description: Deletes a tag.

name: customn8n_updateTag
description: Update a tag.

id.description: The ID of the tag to update.

name.description: The new name for the tag.

name: customn8n_createWorkflow
description: Create a workflow in your instance.

nodes.description: An array of node objects that make up the workflow. Each node represents a step in the workflow.

id.description: Unique identifier for the node within the workflow.

typeVersion.description: Version of the node type being used.

position.description: Position of the node in the workflow editor [x, y]. Array should contain exactly 2 numbers representing x and y coordinates.

parameters.description: Node-specific configuration parameters. Structure varies based on node type.

credentials.description: Credentials configuration for the node. This object maps credential types to their respective credential configurations containing id and name.

webhookId.description: Webhook ID for webhook trigger nodes.

connections.description: Object defining how nodes are connected. Each key is a source node name, and the value describes its outgoing connections. The structure follows n8n's connection format where each node can have 'main' output connections.

executionOrder.description: Execution order strategy for the workflow.

saveManualExecutions.description: Whether to save manual executions in the database.

saveDataErrorExecution.description: When to save executions that error.

callerIds.description: Comma-separated list of workflow IDs that can call this workflow (when callerPolicy is 'workflowsFromAList').

errorWorkflow.description: ID of workflow to execute when this workflow errors.

name: customn8n_getWorkflows
description: Retrieve all workflows from your instance.

tags.description: Comma-separated list of tags to filter by.

excludePinnedData.description: Set to true to avoid retrieving pinned data.

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return.

name: customn8n_getWorkflow
description: Retrieves a workflow.

excludePinnedData.description: Set to true to avoid retrieving pinned data.

name: customn8n_deleteWorkflow
description: Deletes a workflow.

name: customn8n_updateWorkflow
description: Update a workflow.

id.description: The ID of the workflow to update.

name.description: The new name for the workflow.

nodes.description: The updated array of node objects that make up the workflow.

id.description: Unique identifier for the node within the workflow.

typeVersion.description: Version of the node type being used.

position.description: Position of the node in the workflow editor [x, y]. Array should contain exactly 2 numbers representing x and y coordinates.

parameters.description: Node-specific configuration parameters. Structure varies based on node type.

credentials.description: Credentials configuration for the node. This object maps credential types to their respective credential configurations containing id and name.

webhookId.description: Webhook ID for webhook trigger nodes.

connections.description: The updated connections object defining how nodes are connected. Each key is a source node name, and the value describes its outgoing connections.

settings.description: The updated workflow execution and behavior settings.

executionOrder.description: Execution order strategy for the workflow.

saveManualExecutions.description: Whether to save manual executions in the database.

saveDataErrorExecution.description: When to save executions that error.

callerIds.description: Comma-separated list of workflow IDs that can call this workflow (when callerPolicy is 'workflowsFromAList').

errorWorkflow.description: ID of workflow to execute when this workflow errors.

name: customn8n_activateWorkflow
description: Activate a workflow.

name: customn8n_deactivateWorkflow
description: Deactivate a workflow.

name: customn8n_transferWorkflow
description: Transfer a workflow to another project.

id.description: The ID of the workflow to transfer.

destinationProjectId.description: The ID of the project to transfer the workflow to.

name: customn8n_transferCredential
description: Transfer a credential to another project.

id.description: The ID of the credential to transfer.

destinationProjectId.description: The ID of the project to transfer the credential to.

name: customn8n_getWorkflowTags
description: Get workflow tags.

name: customn8n_updateWorkflowTags
description: Update tags of a workflow.

tags.description: List of tag IDs to associate with the workflow.

name: customn8n_getUsers
description: Retrieve all users from your instance. (requires authentication)

limit.description: Maximum number of users to retrieve (default: 100)

cursor.description: Paginate by setting the cursor parameter to the nextCursor attribute returned by the previous request's response. Default value fetches the first page of the collection.

includeRole.description: Whether to include user roles in the response.

name: customn8n_createUsers
description: Create one or more users.

users.description: Array of users to be created.

name: customn8n_getUser
description: Retrieve a user from your instance.

id.description: The ID or email of the user.

includeRole.description: Whether to include the user's role or not.

name: customn8n_deleteUser
description: Delete a user from your instance.

name: customn8n_changeRole
description: Change a user's global role

newRoleName.description: The new global role for the user.

name: customn8n_pull
description: Pull changes from the remote repository. Requires the Source Control feature to be licensed and connected to a repository.

force.description: Force the pull operation, overwriting local changes.

variables.description: Variables to be used during the pull process.

name: customn8n_createVariable
description: Create a variable in your instance.

name: customn8n_getVariables
description: Retrieve variables from your instance.

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return.

name: customn8n_deleteVariable
description: Delete a variable from your instance.

name: customn8n_updateVariable
description: Update a variable from your instance.

id.description: The ID of the variable to update.

key.description: The new key for the variable.

value.description: The new value for the variable.

name: customn8n_createProject
description: Create a project on your instance.

name.description: The name of the project to create.

name: customn8n_getProjects
description: Retrieve projects from your instance.

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return.

name: customn8n_deleteProject
description: Delete a project from your instance.

name: customn8n_updateProject
description: Update a project on your instance.

projectId.description: The ID of the project to update.

name.description: The new name for the project.

name: customn8n_addUsersToProject
description: Add one or more users to a project on your instance.

relations.description: A list of userIds and roles to add to the project.

projectUserId.description: The unique identifier of the user to add.

role.description: The role assigned to the user in the project.

name: customn8n_deleteUserFromProject
description: Delete a user from a project on your instance.

projectUserId.description: The ID of the user to remove from the project.

name: customn8n_changeUserRoleInProject
description: Change a user's role in a project.

projectUserId.description: The ID of the user whose role is to be changed.

role.description: The new role to assign to the user in the project.
